articles.description: Sessions in the lead-up to their embarrassing 4-0 defeat at Brighton last weekend apparently included no specific instructions on how Graham Potter's team would play.
articles.content:
The mood at Manchester United 'is totally flat' as their hugely disappointing time under interim manager Ralf Rangnick fizzles out.
Players are reportedly underwhelmed with the training laid on by R… [+3789 chars]
